Fell the Mighty.name: Fell the Mighty
Fell the Mighty.flavor: Taking on a foe more powerful than you only increases the fury of your attack.
Fell the Mighty.attack: Strength vs. AC. If the target’s current hit point total is higher than yours, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20.
Fell the Mighty.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If this damage makes the target’s current hit point total lower than yours, you also knock the target prone.

Form of the Tribal Champion.name: Form of the Tribal Champion
Form of the Tribal Champion.flavor: The shades of countless ancestors flow through you as you fight, defending you from harm and debilitating your foes.
Form of the Tribal Champion.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each enemy marked by you takes a –8 penalty to attack rolls (instead of –4) for any attack that does not include you as a target.
Form of the Tribal Champion.requirement: The power Form of the Tribal Champion must be active in order to use this power.

Pure Power.name: Pure Power
Pure Power.flavor: You draw on the power of the heroes who watch over you, increasing the potency of your guardian form’s attack.
Pure Power.trigger: You hit with a weapon attack granted by your guardian form
